item.title: Running python 2 and 3 using conda
item.description: Running python 2 and 3 using conda I am taking the M101P course to brush up my Mongo skill, the course is kind of dated, it uses Python 2. However, I use Python 3 on my machine by default. I need a quick and easy way to run python 2 scripts without changing my default settings/path. I found conda offer a great out-of-box solution by using environment. A conda environment is a directory that contains a specific collection of conda packages that you have installed.
